name: High Gear
description:
This is a prototype of a slot car racing game with precise speed management.

You can manage the speed of the car with 1 button. Pressing the button accelerates the car, releasing the button decelerates. The car does not decelerate while in corners.

Every corner has a specific speed limit and a clear starting and ending point. All these information is showed on the road.

When a car exceeds the speed limit of the corner it will stuck for a few seconds.

Goal is to be the first after 3 laps.

Features:

  • 3 tracks
  • Enemy AI
  • Local multiplayer for 2 players
  • 2 weapons (missile and mine)

Controls:

  • Player1 accelerates with A and activates weapon with S
  • Player2 accelerates with L and activates weapon with K

Feedback is appreciated.
